MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the DG6 and DG7 areas of Kirkcudbright and Castle Douglas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located a grounded overhead electricity line near Marks Farm and due to the further repair work required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 1pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:49am on Saturday, 06 February 2021
